pageProduct.name: Olay Total Effects 7 in One Night Face Cream Moisturiser 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

TOTAL EFFECTS NIGHT FIRMING CREAM

PREVENTATIVE ANTI-AGEING FORMULA

Olay Total Effects Night Firming Cream moisturises while you sleep to reveal younger-looking skin by morning. The vitamin-rich formula delivers seven skin benefits in one: replenishes moisture, evens skin tone appearance, enhances brightness, visibly smoothes fine lines and wrinkles, minimises the look of pores, restores firmness and visibly reduces dark spots. It's dermatotlogically tested, fast absorbing and won't clog pores.

Total Effects is Olay's Preventative Anti-Ageing Collection. Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help fight sign of ageing for younger-looking skin.

7-IN-ONE BENEFITS, INGREDIENTS, SCIENCE AND REGIMEN

7-In-One Benefits: Replenishes moisture, evens skin tone appearance, enhances brightness, visibly smoothes fine lines and wrinkles, minimises the look of pores, restores firmness and visibly reduces dark spots.
Ingredients: This all-in-one night treatment, with VitaNiacin Complex, works while you sleep to fight seven signs of ageing. It's nourishing formula with vitamins B3, B5, E and C exfoliates to enhance skin's natural self-renewal process. Plus, it's dermatologically tested.
Science: Nighttime is when your skin repairs, recovers and recharges. During the day your skin is busy fighting environmental stressors like UV rays and pollution, but at night, skin's repairing process is more active. Total Effects Night Firming Cream replenishes skin throughout the night to visibly reduce the signs of ageing for younger-looking skin.
Regimen: Night Firming Cream moisturiser is the last step in your daily skincare regimen. Use Olay Total Effects cleansers and treatments before applying moisturiser. Massage cream onto your face and neck at night after cleansing.

FIND THE RIGHT COLLECTION FOR YOUR SKIN

Regenerist formulas, with key anti-ageing ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin.
Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help fight signs of ageing for younger-looking skin.
ProX formulas, with ingredients like pro-retinol and amino peptides, offer proven skincare solutions to target root causes of ageing for healthy-looking skin.
The Olay Eyes Collection is specifically formulated for the delicate eye area to fight virtually every eye concern: dark circles, puffy eyes, fine lines and under eye wrinkles.

General Information

Olay Total Effects Night Face Cream Moisturiser is a vitamin enriched moisturiser for fresh & radiant skin. Antioxidant boost revives dull & tired skin. Youthful radiance starts day 1.

Olay Total Effects Night Face Cream Moisturiser is a vitamin enriched moisturiser for fresh & radiant skin. Antioxidant boost revives dull & tired skin. Youthful radiance starts day 1.



- Nourishes for soft & smooth skin




- Helps revive tired-looking skin and reduce fine lines and spots to give healthy fresh radiance




- Reduces look of fine lines & spots




- Vitamin enriched (B3, Pro-B5, E) anti-ageing complex




- Recommended to use after the Olay Total Effects 7 in 1 Foaming Cleanser and Serum at night




- Fast-absorbing, dermatologically tested and non-Comedogenic (won't clog pores)




Olay Total Effects 7 in One Night Cream is a nightly moisturiser. Firms skin and provides 7 anti-ageing benefits in 1 product - all while you sleep.




It utilises the anti-ageing power of moisture with a complex of vitamins, antioxidants and wheat protein. Creates visibly firmer, younger-looking skin every morning.




Formulated with green tea & vitamins (B3, Pro-B5, E). Gives skin an antioxidant boost and revives dull and tired looking skin.




Olay Total Effects 7 in One Night Cream tackles 7 skin problems in 1. Fine lines and wrinkles. Uneven skin tone. Dark spots. Uneven texture. Dryness, dullness and visible pores.




 

Product Claims: Youthful radiance starts day 1

Size: 50g

KEY FEATURES

• Olay Total Effects 7 in One Night Face Cream Moisturiser is a vitamin enriched moisturiser for fresh and radiant skin; Antioxidant boost; Revives dull and tired skin; Youthful radiance starts day 1
• Contains Vitamin E: An antioxidant known to defend skin surface from free radicals that cause skin ageing
• Contains Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Brightens skin tone and known to boost skin energy
• Contains Vitamin Pro- B5: Known to soothe skin
• Olay Total Effects 7 in One Night Cream is a nightly moisturiser. Firms skin and provides 7 anti-ageing benefits in 1 product - all while you sleep.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Important information, do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Isohexadecane, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Isostearate, Polyacrylamide, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Panthenol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Titanium Dioxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethiconol, Fragrance, Laureth-7, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, PEG-100 Stearate, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract.

Directions

Apply liberally to cleansed face and neck every night.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
